name: OLSA: One Life, One Action
description:
Top ball-shooting puzzler. Knockdown all the pins on each screen to progress!

In theme with the 2019 GMTK Game Jam almost everything in this game has just one!

-You only have one action!

-You only have one try before you restart the level

- You only work on a single screen!

-Each piece of music only consists of one note!

-The Game was made by a single dev!

To open the menu while in game press Escape or P
